title: Crock Pot Coca-Cola Roast
directions: Place beef in crock pot (slow cooker) and top with dry onion soup mix.
Mix together the cream of mushroom soup and the Coca-Cola in a bowl and pour over roast.
Set crock pot on low, cook for 6-8 hours. The longer you cook, the more tender the meat becomes. The liquid makes a great gravy!
ingredients: 1 beef roast of choice (use the size roast and the amount of vegetables you need to feed your family. I used a 2.5 pound Chuck Roast)
1 (12 oz) can Coke or Pepsi (NOT diet!)
